channel.title: Whonix Problem with installation
channel.description: youtube /watch?v=cXZDCMsxHlY hello, I do everything as a guide, and it not want to turn on the whonix system, I start whonix whorkstation and whonix gateway and after installing everything is further black window and writes to enter username and password, enter and nothing happens. how to fix it to work? unwilling to turn whonix .My Windows 7 Thin 32bit operating system I use Virtualbox 5.2.30 I have a 2ghz procesor Ram 2GB laptop ,help.

item.title: Whonix Problem with installation
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi Badyl, Welcome to the Whonix forum!

Since the youtube video tutorial is in an unfamiliar language Iâ€™m not able to comment about its accuracy. Since you are running a 64bit VM on a 32bit host the following may apply here;

https://askubuntu.com/questions/180761/can-i-use-virtualbox-with-a-64-bit-image-in-a-32-bit-host
if you want to use 64-bit guest support on a 32-bit host operating system, you must also select a 64-bit operating system for the particular VM. Since supporting 64 bits on 32-bit hosts incurs additional overhead, VirtualBox only enables this support upon explicit request.

It is also possible that you have a low RAM isssue

https://whonix.org/wiki/Troubleshooting#Low_RAM_Issues

Read full topic
